v8:item.v8:content: Entry and edition of data from previous periods is allowed.
Dates of restriction of entering and editing previous period data are disabled in the application settings.
Period-end closing date setting method common date
Specify relative period-end closing date and delay
Number of days to delay period-end closing date
Data modification is not allowed till %1

Standard commands context menu period-end closing dates
